title: StarterUI
description: @icon-megaphone StarterUI is a powerful web UI generator that requires zero configuration or HTML+CSS development, and instead relies on a well-defined JSON API structure to construct an interface. With StarterUI, any developer can build a functional web (and in the future mobile) application with only knowledge of one server-side programming language.

+.title: About
+.description: StarterUI reveals a beautiful app from a JSON API in your choice of programming language.

+.title: Learn
+.description: StarterUI has a clearly documented JSON schema and easy-to-use components.

+.title: Quickstart
+.description: It's easy to get started with this tutorial. We'll walk you through building the classic todo list app.
